GSD.description:
USB: host: isp116x: check return value after calling platform_get_resource()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.318 by commit 804de302ada3544699c5f48c5314b249af76faa3. For more details please see the references link.
